casebody.data:
No. 09-787. Union Pacific Railroad Company, Petitioner v. Sompo Japan Insurance Company of America, et al. (two judgments). 561 U.S. 1021, 130 S. Ct. 3499,

177 L. Ed. 2d 1085,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 5349. June 28, 2010.

The petition for a writ of certiorari is granted. The judgment is vacated, and the case is remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit for further consideration in light of Kawasaki Kisen Kaisha Ltd. v. Regal-Beloit Corp., 561 U.S. 89, 130 S. Ct. 2433, 177 L. Ed. 2d 424 (2010). Justice Sotomayor took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 341 Fed. Appx. 706 (first judgment) and 341 Fed. Appx. 707 (second judgment).
